legends.title: Sangkuriang
legends.summary: Legend of Sangkuriang and Mount Tangkuban Perahu.
legends.example_prompt: Create a cinematic 20s video of Sangkuriang at Mount Tangkuban Perahu, misty mountains, semantic grounding in Sundanese culture.

legends.title: Dewi Sri
legends.example_prompt: Generate an evocative image of Dewi Sri among rice terraces at dawn, warm golden light.

templates.label: Sangkuriang — Video (Cinematic)
templates.prompt: Create a cinematic 20s video of Sangkuriang at Mount Tangkuban Perahu, misty mountains, kecapi-suling background.

templates.label: Dewi Sri — Image (Golden Dawn)
templates.prompt: Generate an evocative image of Dewi Sri among rice terraces at dawn.
